basics.name: Andrey Akulov
basics.label: Elixir developer
basics.summary: I am an elixir developer with experience of building applications in complex domains. I love testing, teaching others, and rant about technologies.

jobs.name: Elonsoft
highlights: Work on investment platform. Made a lot of huge complex refactors and extensions to the platform

jobs.name: BGaming
highlights: Involved in the building of an architecture of a new service in the company.
Created a card game MVP. Responsible for adding new integrations to casinos.

jobs.name: Hero Labs
highlights: Worked on the backend part. Led implementing an external API. Made a legionella feature intergration.

jobs.name: Qvant
highlights: Worked on the backend of the advertisement platform.
Integrated a yandex-banner service into the service workflow.
Added a scheduled banner rotation reports feature.
Redesigned and refactored billing for mtboxes (mac sniffers).

jobs.name: LavkaLavka
highlights: Revamped the online store. Integrated a coupon and referral system.

jobs.name: Freelance
highlights: I've shipped a travel apartment aggregator using elixir, similar travel apartment aggregator with ability to book airline tickets using ruby, a news aggregator site, a plugin to work with email for zendesk, and have done other small contracts.

jobs.name: Technologies of electronic goverment
skills: elixir, graphql, cqrs/es, ruby, react/react native, ansible
highlights: Was responsible for the API-backend development. Supervised a small team of colleagues. Developed and documented the architecture of the app.

jobs.name: Ensotech
highlights: Developed and supported ESC(electronic speed control) configuration applications:
- Cross-platform app (windows, android) based on kivi framework (python)
- Desktop app on WPF (C#) (only support, bugs, minor features)
- Mobile app on android (native android, java) (it was the replacement of kivi mobile app)
Released a desktop helicopter app.

jobs.name: Garant Plus
highlights: Developed a web interface for IP gateway based on asterisk. Assembled rpm/ deb packages.
Refactored scattered scripts into a solid MVC-application.
Added multiple features including a dial plan compositor.

jobs.name: SeoGrand
highlights: Was responsible for the sites development and the supporting stage after.
We built content related and e-commerce sites for small businesses.
